cards.text: Which device is used to convert mechanical energy into electrical energy? (Transformer/Generator)
What is a material that allows electricity to pass through it? (Insulator/Conductor)
Which material is the opposite of a conductor and prevents or blocks the flow of electricity? (Insulator/Conductor)
What device opens and closes an electric circuit?
Which one of these materials is a good conductor of electricity, gold or plastic?
State True or False: Electric wires are coated with plastic or rubber because those materials are good insulators.
What helps to convert chemical energy into electrical energy, a cell or a dynamo?
State True or False: Two batteries in a circuit could make the lights in the circuit brighter than one battery.
What is the path along which current needs to flow called, a circuit or resistor?
What kind of charge does an electron have, negative or positive?

description: Learn about electricity by answering the given questions.
